case_metadata.case_type: Breach of Contract & Intellectual Property Misappropriation

core_allegation: Former CEO stole proprietary AI algorithm and trade secrets to launch competing startup

evidence_emails.subject: FW: Proprietary Algorithm - CONFIDENTIAL
evidence_emails.body: Forwarding to my personal account. Need this for 'side project'. Will delete from company servers.
evidence_emails.significance: SMOKING GUN - Direct evidence of misappropriation

evidence_emails.subject: Introducing StartupXYZ - Revolutionary AI
evidence_emails.body: We've developed a breakthrough AI algorithm that outperforms market leaders by 35%...
evidence_emails.significance: Describes stolen TechCorp algorithm as his own

evidence_emails.subject: RE: Implementation details
evidence_emails.body: Use the exact architecture from TechCorp. I have the complete source code and documentation.
evidence_emails.significance: Confession of theft and unauthorized use of proprietary code

technical_evidence.finding: StartupXYZ GitHub repository contains TechCorp proprietary code
technical_evidence.similarity: 97% code match with TechCorp algorithm (verified by expert)

technical_evidence.finding: Metadata in StartupXYZ code shows TechCorp file paths and comments

financial_impact.techcorp_damages: €5.2M in lost market share (first 6 months of StartupXYZ operation)
financial_impact.investor_funds_to_startup: €2.8M based on false claims of proprietary technology

defendant_response: Klaus claims algorithm is generic and independently developed
court_orders: Temporary Restraining Order - StartupXYZ cannot use TechCorp algorithm
